001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005import java.util.stream.Collectors;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Referencable;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.ResourceIdentifiable;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryReference;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.ProductTypeReference;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.review.ReviewRatingStatistics;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.state.StateReference;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.tax_category.TaxCategoryReference;
015
016public interface ProductMixin extends Referencable<Product>, ResourceIdentifiable<Product> {
017    @Override
018    public default ProductResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier() {
019        return ProductResourceIdentifier.builder().id(getId()).build();
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public default ProductReference toReference() {
024        return ProductReference.builder().id(getId()).build();
025    }
026
027    public static ProductProjection toProjection(final Product template,
028            final ProductProjectionType productProjectionType) {
029        ProductDataLike productDataLike = template.getMasterData().get(productProjectionType);
030        return ProductProjection.builder()
031                .id(template.getId())
032                .version(template.getVersion())
033                .createdAt(template.getCreatedAt())
034                .lastModifiedAt(template.getLastModifiedAt())
035                .key(template.getKey())
036                .productType(ProductTypeReference.deepCopy(template.getProductType()))
037                .name(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getName()))
038                .description(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getDescription()))
039                .slug(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getSlug()))
040                .categories(Optional.ofNullable(productDataLike.getCategories())
041                        .map(c -> c.stream().map(CategoryReference::deepCopy).collect(Collectors.toList()))
042                        .orElse(null))
043                .categoryOrderHints(CategoryOrderHints.deepCopy(productDataLike.getCategoryOrderHints()))
044                .metaTitle(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getMetaTitle()))
045                .metaDescription(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getMetaDescription()))
046                .metaKeywords(LocalizedString.deepCopy(productDataLike.getMetaKeywords()))
047                .searchKeywords(SearchKeywords.deepCopy(productDataLike.getSearchKeywords()))
048                .hasStagedChanges(template.getMasterData().getHasStagedChanges())
049                .published(template.getMasterData().getPublished())
050                .masterVariant(ProductVariant.deepCopy(productDataLike.getMasterVariant()))
051                .variants(Optional.ofNullable(productDataLike.getVariants())
052                        .map(v -> v.stream().map(ProductVariant::deepCopy).collect(Collectors.toList()))
053                        .orElse(null))
054                .taxCategory(TaxCategoryReference.deepCopy(template.getTaxCategory()))
055                .state(StateReference.deepCopy(template.getState()))
056                .reviewRatingStatistics(ReviewRatingStatistics.deepCopy(template.getReviewRatingStatistics()))
057                .priceMode(template.getPriceMode())
058                .build();
059    }
060}
